participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys social interactions and physical activities.
participant_1.background: My favourite band is kings of leon. I like football. I work in the IT industry. I am a Christian.

participant_2.name: Ben
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and determined, enjoys challenges and outdoor sports.
participant_2.background: My family is very supportive of my skiing. I broke my arm skiing once. I am a competitive ski racer. My hair is a reddish brown.

content.text: Hi, my name is Alex!
Hi, my name is Ben. What do you do for fun?
I like to play football, listen to music, and go to church.
I like to ski, and I also enjoy listening to music.
That's cool! Have you ever broken a bone skiing?
Yes, I broke my arm once.
Oh no! How did that happen?
I was skiing down a mountain too fast and I hit a tree.
That must have been scary!
It was, but I'm glad it wasn't worse.
I'm glad too. I'm not sure I would be brave enough to ski that fast!
It's definitely not for everyone.
What do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to a lot of different music, but my favorite band is Kings of Leon.
I've heard of them! They're pretty good.
Yeah, they're one of my favorites. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to a lot of different music too, but my favorite genre is probably alternative rock.
Nice! I like some alternative rock too.
What's your favorite alternative rock band?
I don't really have a favorite, but I like a lot of bands like The Killers, The Strokes, and Arctic Monkeys.
Nice! I like those bands too. I'm glad we have similar tastes in music.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who you can relate to.
